chat_history.content: Can you help me with Shingles?

Absolutely! At Highland Contractors, we offer some of the finest roofing shingles available in the country. As a GAF-certified roofer, we provide top-quality shingles backed by robust warranties for your peace of mind. Whether you need a complete installation or replacement, our comprehensive roof maintenance services ensure your roof remains in peak condition throughout its lifespan.

Would you like to get a free estimate or learn more about our shingle options? Feel free to contact us at 585-507-3658 for Rochester residents, 716-748-8858 for Buffalo residents, or 585-919-6646 for Canandaigua residents. You can also reach us via email at office@highlandcontractors.net. Let us know how we can assist you further!

Hello Rahul Sharma,

Thank you for reaching out! How can we assist you with your home improvement needs today? Are you interested in Residential Roofing, Solar Roofing, Commercial Services, Siding, Skylight Services, Windows & Doors, Carpentry, Fencing, or Gutters? 

Feel free to let us know how you would like to be contacted—Phone, Email, or Text Message. We are here to help you get started with a free estimate!

Looking forward to assisting you,
Highland Contractors
